verses.verse: I lifted up<WH5375> my eyes<WH5869> again<WH7200>, and looked, and behold a man<WH376> with a measuring<WH4060> line<WH2256> in his hand<WH3027>.

Then said<WH559> I<WH1980>, Where go you<WH559>? And he said unto me<WH4058>, To measure Jerusalem<WH3389>, to see<WH7200> what<WH4100> is the breadth<WH7341> there<WH753>, and what is the length there.
And<WH4397>, behold, the angel that talked<WH1696> with me went forth<WH3318>, and another<WH312> angel<WH4397> went out<WH3318> to meet him<WH7125>,

And said<WH559> unto him<WH7323>, Run, speak<WH1696> to this<WH1975> young man<WH5288>, saying<WH559>, Jerusalem<WH3389> shall be inhabited<WH3427> as towns without walls<WH6519> for the multitude<WH7230> of men<WH120> and cattle<WH929> in it<WH8432>:
For I<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>, will be unto her a wall<WH2346> of fire<WH784> round about<WH5439>, and will be the glory<WH3519> in the midst of her<WH8432>.

Ho<WH1945>, ho<WH1945>, come forth<WH5127>, and flee from the land<WH776> of the north<WH6828>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>: for I have spread you abroad<WH6566> as the four<WH702> winds<WH7307> of the heaven<WH8064>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.
Deliver<WH4422> yourself<WH1945>, O Zion<WH6726>, that dwell<WH3427> with the daughter<WH1323> of Babylon<WH894>.

For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; After<WH310> the glory<WH3519> has he sent<WH7971> me unto the nations<WH1471> which spoiled<WH7997> you<WH5060>: for he that touches you touches<WH5060> the apple<WH892> of his eye<WH5869>.

For<WH5130>, behold, I will shake my hand<WH3027> upon them<WH7998>, and they shall be a plunder to their servants<WH5647>: and you shall know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sent me<WH7971>.
Sing<WH7442> and rejoice<WH8055>, O daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726>: for<WH935>, behold, I come, and I will live<WH7931> in the midst<WH8432> of you<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>.

And many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> shall be joined<WH3867> to the Lord<WH3068> in that day<WH3117>, and shall be my people<WH5971>: and I will live<WH7931> in the midst<WH8432> of you<WH3045>, and you shall know that the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> has sent me unto you<WH7971>.
And the Lord<WH3068> shall inherit<WH5157> Judah<WH3063> his portion<WH2506> in the holy<WH6944> land<WH127>, and shall choose<WH977> Jerusalem again<WH3389>.
Be silent<WH2013>, O all flesh<WH1320>, before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>: for he is raised up<WH5782> out of his holy<WH6944> habitation<WH4583>.
